721012f-a.title: Manhattan: Lexington Avenue - 48th Street (East)
721012f-a.text:
Lexington Avenue, east side, from East 48th to 49th
Street's, showing the newly completed Hotel Shelton.
Arthur Loomis Harmon, the architect was awarded the
Architectural League of New York Medal Award of 1925
for this design.
About 1926
MAY RE REPRODUCED

713322f-a.title: Manhattan: 48th Street (East) - Lexington Avenue
713322f-a.text:
East 48th Street, north side, east from (No. 141), but net including
Lexington Ave. Nos. 1414147, are being demelished.
September 28, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

713320f-a.text:
